peroni.title: Peroni
peroni.description: Brewed since 1846, Peroni uses only selected ingredients such as 100% Italian Malt, the result of a special quality of barley, to offer Italians a high quality beer.

peroni_nastro-azzurro_stile-capri.title: Peroni Nastro Azzurro Stile Capri
peroni_nastro-azzurro_stile-capri.description: With its light and refreshing taste, Peroni Nastro Azzurro Stile Capri features fresh notes of lemon and olive leaves that help give it Mediterranean hints, perfect for summer aperitifs.

peroni_cruda.title: Peroni Cruda
peroni_cruda.description: Low-temperature microfiltration gives Peroni Cruda a fresh taste, a smooth, creamy texture and a pleasantly bitter hop aftertaste for a refreshing experience.

peroni_nastro-azzurro.title: Peroni Nastro Azzurro
peroni_nastro-azzurro.description: Dry and refreshing taste with light notes of bitterness that are balanced by the aroma of flowers and spices. Peroni Nastro Azzurro is light and fragrant for a sense of freshness from the first sip.

peroni_non-filtrata.title: Peroni Non Filtrata
peroni_non-filtrata.description: Full flavor and aromatic notes of grain. Its typically opaque color, given by unfiltering, preserves in Peroni Non Filtrata the authentic flavor of unprocessed ingredients.

asahi_super-dry.title: Asahi Super Dry
asahi_super-dry.description: The ultimate Japanese beer. Brewed with innovative technologies to ensure its dry taste, Asahi Super Dry cleanses and gratifies the palate sip after sip.

kozel_lager.title: Kozel lager
kozel_lager.description: Rich, smooth taste and a delicate aroma of malt and hops. Kozel Lager comes from a blend of 3 malts, giving it a balanced taste and pleasant aroma.

peroni_nastro-azzurro_00.title: Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0%
peroni_nastro-azzurro_00.description: Dry and refreshing taste with slight notes of bitterness that are balanced by the aroma of flowers and spices. Peroni Nastro Azzurro 0.0% is light and fragrant for a sense of freshness from the first sip.

peroni_senza-glutine.title: Peroni Senza Glutine
peroni_senza-glutine.description: The Peroni of all time, with a perfect balance of sweet and bitter and a low-hop flavor that is easy to drink. Peroni Gluten Free is perfect for enjoying a good beer while following a gluten-free diet.

kozel_dark.title: Kozel Dark
kozel_dark.description: Light and surprisingly refreshing taste. The perfect balance of sweet caramel and fresh hop aroma give Kozel Dark a smooth but never cloying taste.

peroni_gran-riserva_rossa.title: Peroni Gran Riserva Rossa
peroni_gran-riserva_rossa.description: Light-bodied, yet endowed with aromatic complexity thanks to notes of malt and caramel. Low-temperature fermentation gives Peroni Gran Riserva Rossa a smooth and unique taste.
